0.text: EFFECT RADIUS: 300

Innate: Whenever Sylas casts an ability, he generate a stack of Unshackled for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 3 times. While Sylas has stacks, he gains  125% bonus attack speed.

1.text: Unshackled: Sylas' next basic attack is empowered to consume a stack to whirl his chains around him, which has an  uncancellable windup and deals 130% AD (+ 25% AP) magic damage to the primary target and 40% AD (+ 20% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
1.html: Unshackled: Sylas' next basic attack is empowered to consume a stack to whirl his chains around him, which has an uncancellable windup and deals 130% AD (+ 25% AP) magic damage to the primary target and 40% AD (+ 20% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup

2.text: Damage to secondary targets executes  minions that would be left below  25 health.
